Vignette_AD.synopsis: The workers are discussing a third worker who skipped on the job. That’s the third one they lose. At this pace they’re never going to fix up the wall! If talked to you learned the missing person stayed working late in the evening - they probably went to drink afterwards and passed out.

HalfOrcWorker.synopsis: Building site for the wall expansion. They keep losing workers for some reason- the ones who stay working late in the evening sometimes disappear.The workers are discussing a third worker who skipped on the job. That’s the third one they lose. At this pace they’re never going to fix up the wall! If talked to you learned the missing person stayed working late in the evening - they probably went to drink afterwards and passed out.

HumanWorker.synopsis: Building site for the wall expansion. They keep losing workers for some reason- the ones who stay working late in the evening sometimes disappear.The workers are discussing a third worker who skipped on the job. That’s the third one they lose. At this pace they’re never going to fix up the wall! If talked to you learned the missing person stayed working late in the evening - they probably went to drink afterwards and passed out.

Vignette_AD_2.speaker: Paddo Garrard
Vignette_AD_2.text: Come to think of it, Tamrin really didn't seem the type to just bugger off...
Vignette_AD_2.context: NodeContext: Cogs whirring, but not figured it out

Vignette_AD_12.speaker: Buntter
Vignette_AD_12.text: Neither did Berrk. Or Perral. Didn't stop them running.
Vignette_AD_12.context: NodeContext: Referring to previous workers who disappeared

Vignette_AD_1.speaker: Paddo Garrard
Vignette_AD_1.text: Tarrin worked harder than they did. He was still chipping away when I left last night.

Vignette_AD_0.speaker: Buntter
Vignette_AD_0.text: Never saw when he left though, did we? He could be propping the bar in the Elfsong for all we know.

Vignette_AD_3.speaker: Buntter
Vignette_AD_3.text: That's funny... Tamrin's tools are still here.
Vignette_AD_3.context: NodeContext: Mild suspicion -  a mason would never leave their tools

Vignette_AD_14.speaker: Paddo Garrard
Vignette_AD_14.text: Maybe he is coming back then. He'd never leave them behind.
Vignette_AD_14.context: NodeContext: Sees this as a positive

Vignette_AD_7.speaker: Buntter
Vignette_AD_7.text: Chisel, hammer, trowel... Nothing missing at all.
Vignette_AD_7.context: NodeContext: Still suspicious, not buying his colleague's interpretation

Vignette_AD_11.speaker: Paddo Garrard
Vignette_AD_11.text: If he doesn't come back, I'm having his chisel. Mine's bloody useless.

Vignette_AD_5.speaker: Buntter
Vignette_AD_5.text: Where in the hells has Tamrin got to?

Vignette_AD_8.speaker: Paddo Garrard
Vignette_AD_8.text: Wish I bloody knew. This job's a six-hander - we can't do it without him.

Vignette_AD_9.speaker: Buntter
Vignette_AD_9.text: Another one who can't take a bit of hard work.
Vignette_AD_9.context: NodeContext: Pessimistic about the size of the job, alluding to previous masons who've disappeared unexpectedly

Vignette_AD_10.speaker: Paddo Garrard
Vignette_AD_10.text: First one to give up before he got paid though.
Vignette_AD_10.context: NodeContext: Observing, slightly curious about this fact

Vignette_AD_13.speaker: Paddo Garrard
Vignette_AD_13.text: Think we can get the wall built, just the two of us?

Vignette_AD_6.speaker: Buntter
Vignette_AD_6.text: I doubt it. But we'll try.

Vignette_AD_15.speaker: Paddo Garrard
Vignette_AD_15.text: I really thought Tamrin would stick it out. He was a good mason.

Vignette_AD_4.speaker: Buntter
Vignette_AD_4.text: A good mason turns up for work. Tamrin ain't a good mason.

HalfOrcWorker_0.speaker: Buntter
HalfOrcWorker_0.text: You one of Tamrin's friends? Well, we haven't seen him. He did a runner one night, never came back. You won't find him here.

HalfOrcWorker_1.speaker: Buntter
HalfOrcWorker_1.text: That's the last time I let anyone work late without me. Bloody idler didn't get a thing done.

HumanWorker_0.speaker: Paddo Garrard
HumanWorker_0.text: You aren't a stone mason by any chance? No, I suppose not.
HumanWorker_0.context: NodeContext: At first optimistic, then realises he's being stupid

HumanWorker_1.speaker: Paddo Garrard
HumanWorker_1.text: Careful where you tread. Wouldn't want you getting stone dust on your clothes.
